subject: Tax Evasion
Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: The two-time Indianapolis 500 winner Hélio Castroneves, who also won an edition of “Dancing With the Stars,” pleaded not guilty to federal tax evasion charges. Castroneves, 33, was released on $10 million bail after a court appearance in which he was shackled in handcuffs and leg chains and was visibly weeping into a wad of white tissue. Outside, Castroneves said he was overwhelmed by the weight of the moment.
